H0.text: What is the more common name for 'transposons' discovered by Barbara McClintock who investigated the reason for uneven splattering of color in corn kernels. Controlling Element

H1.text: What is the more common name for 'transposons' discovered by Barbara McClintock who investigated the reason for uneven splattering of color in corn kernels. Jumping Gene

H2.text: What is the more common name for 'transposons' discovered by Barbara McClintock who investigated the reason for uneven splattering of color in corn kernels. Mobile Genetic Element

H3.text: What is the more common name for 'transposons' discovered by Barbara McClintock who investigated the reason for uneven splattering of color in corn kernels. Transposon

A6.text: Transposable elements are also known as transposons, jumping genes, or mobile genetic elements.

A7.text: Barbara McClintock noted unusual color patterns in corn leaves during her experiments.
